parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A token that ensures idempotency. This token expires in 10 minutes. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: datasetTitle
parameters.description: Display title for a FinSpace Dataset.

parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: The format in which Dataset data is structured. TABULAR --- Data is structured in a tabular format. NON_TABULAR --- Data is structured in a non-tabular format.

parameters.name: ownerInfo
parameters.description: Contact information for a Dataset owner. name (string) --- The name of the Dataset owner. phoneNumber (string) --- Phone number for the Dataset owner. email (string) --- Email address for the Dataset owner.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the Dataset owner.

nested_params.name: phoneNumber
nested_params.description: Phone number for the Dataset owner.

nested_params.name: email
nested_params.description: Email address for the Dataset owner.

parameters.name: permissionGroupParams
parameters.description: Permission group parameters for Dataset permissions. permissionGroupId (string) --- The unique identifier for the PermissionGroup. datasetPermissions (list) --- List of resource permissions. (dict) --- Resource permission for a dataset. When you create a dataset, all the other members of the same user group inherit access to the dataset. You can only create a dataset if your user group has application permission for Create Datasets. The following is a list of valid dataset permissions that you can apply: ViewDatasetDetails ReadDatasetDetails AddDatasetData CreateDataView EditDatasetMetadata DeleteDataset For more information on the dataset permissions, see Supported Dataset Permissions in the FinSpace User Guide. permission (string) --- Permission for a resource.

nested_params.name: permissionGroupId
nested_params.description: The unique identifier for the PermissionGroup.

parameters.name: schemaDefinition
parameters.description: Definition for a schema on a tabular Dataset. tabularSchemaConfig (dict) --- The configuration for a schema on a tabular Dataset. columns (list) --- List of column definitions. (dict) --- The definition of a column in a tabular Dataset. dataType (string) --- Data type of a column. STRING --- A String data type. CHAR --- A char data type. INTEGER --- An integer data type. TINYINT --- A tinyint data type. SMALLINT --- A smallint data type. BIGINT --- A bigint data type. FLOAT --- A float data type. DOUBLE --- A double data type. DATE --- A date data type. DATETIME --- A datetime data type. BOOLEAN --- A boolean data type. BINARY --- A binary data type. columnName (string) --- The name of a column. columnDescription (string) --- Description for a column. primaryKeyColumns (list) --- List of column names used for primary key. (string) --- Column Name.

nested_params.name: tabularSchemaConfig
nested_params.description: The configuration for a schema on a tabular Dataset.

nested_params.name: primaryKeyColumns
nested_params.description: List of column names used for primary key.

return_structure.name: datasetId
return_structure.description: (dict) --- The response from a CreateDataset operation.

nested_items.name: datasetId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the created Dataset.
